name: Jo-Anne Sinclair
description: A chief executive officer, the highest-ranking person in a company or other institution, ultimately responsible for making managerial decisions.

name: Jackson Smith
description: The chief operating officer (COO) is responsible for executing and implementing the operational directives set by the CEO and the board of directors.

name: Susan Thomas
description: A chief financial officer, a senior executive with responsibility for the financial affairs of a corporation or other institution. The vice president of administration position is responsible for directing all of the administrative functions of the corporation in accordance with industry standards, regulatory agencies, and company objectives.

name: Richa Kaur
description: Responsible for Consumer and Commercial Banking divisions, including lending, investing, risk management, marketing, and technology. Provides a suite of solutions to help retail and commercial customers meet financial goals.

name: Josee Benjamin
description: Chief Information Officer (CIO) is the most senior executive responsible for information technology and computer systems that support bank goals.

name: Vincent Grey
description: Responsible for the overall strategic marketing plans for the organization in order to attract potential customers and retain existing ones.

name: Rupa Kharki (she/her/hers)
description: Ensures company operations comply with national and international laws and regulations, professional standards, and accepted business practices.

name: Xun Kuang
description: Responsible for organizational development, recruitment and staffing, employment law, performance management, employee relations, and compensation and benefits.

name: Stien Pedersen
description: Senior executive managing legal affairs for the company.

name: Sandra Bear
description: Manages IT infrastructure, operations, and services; ensures access and usability of data and services.

description: Responsible for establishing and maintaining the bankâ€™s information security vision, strategy, and program to protect information assets and technologies.

description: Responsible for analysis and reconciliation of accounts, and developing and implementing accounting policies, procedures, and controls.

name: Valentine Smith
description: Identifies, assesses, and integrates physical security operations, technology, and policy solutions at the organization.

role: Manager, Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery
name: Abd al-Hamid Alami
description: Develops, maintains, or implements business continuity and disaster recovery strategies and solutions, including risk assessments and business impact analyses.

name: Victoria Gray
description: Performs full audits including risk management, control management, and financial reliability assessments to ensure compliance.

name: Jean Ngoy
description: Designs and oversees implementation of security measures for information systems, ensuring compliance with policies and resistance to threats.

name: Samantha Nettle
description: Monitors and manages operational and economic risk exposures to minimize risk and establish controls.

name: Samir Hassan
description: Leads procurement efforts to maximize value from suppliers for business units and partners.

name: Pran Singh
description: Develops and executes strategic marketing plans to attract potential customers and retain existing ones.
